alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:38PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of through 715 PM MDT... At 638 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moab, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Moab around 655 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 126 and 134. Utah 128 between mile markers 0 and 2. Utah 279 near mile marker 5, and between mile markers 13 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
